about_the_game:
Race Against Time!

Lofirunner is a fast, 3D platformer with toon artstyle and versatile movement ranging from wallrunning to dashing. Race against time in different levels while avoiding obstacles. Challenge yourself with the hardest time medals that require vast knowledge of the game's movement.

Features

  • Plenty of Levels
    10 Levels at launch

  • Versatile Movement
    Utilize grapple, dashing, sliding and more to reach the best times.

  • True Challenge
    Challenge your self with hard time medals.

  • Toon Artstyle
    Enjoy different colorful enviroments.

  • Steam Achievements
    Challenge yourself.

  • Music
    Amazing soundtrack, made by Tuomas Lehtonen.
